caption.center: STATE OF MISSOURI, RESPONDENT, v. RICHARD M. OWENS, APPELLANT.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

date.center: Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied

opinion.opinion_text:
